about_the_game:
A racing simulation and arcade game based on Tunnel Boats and Hydroplanes. Explore beautiful race locations in a variety of unique watercraft, including some of the fastest and most iconic power boats in the world. Improve your skill, upgrade your equipment, expand your garage, customize your hull, and dominate the competition.

An outboard performance craft that is one of the fastest turning vehicles on the planet. Weighing less than 450kg with the driver and engine, and capable of turning more than 180° nearly instantaneously. In the tightest of turns the driver can experience up to 4g's. With over 400hp and revving over 10,000rpm these boats can accelerate from 0-60 in about two seconds and reach top speeds of up to 250kph. Measuring around 6 meters in length and powered by a single V6 two-stroke outboard engine using a three or four blade super-cavitating propeller.

The fastest boat in sanctioned competition and raced for over 100 years. A massive hull 9 meters in length weighing around 3,000kg and powered by a turbine engine. This craft has over 3,000hp which means water shredding speeds up to 320kph. Extreme speeds combined with intermittent vision as enormous walls of water known as "rooster tails" are thrown behind the boat. These boats use three, four and five blade super-cavitating propellers.

An ocean-going vessel with a Deep V design that cuts through the waves instead of hydroplaning over them. A hull 12 meters or larger and built to withstand enormous impacts, weighing a wave crushing 4,000kg, yet still capable of reaching speeds over 270kph. Featuring two drivers; one that steers the boat called a wheelman, and one that handles acceleration called a throttle-man. Their combined skill and coordination is crucial to overall performance. Powered by two V8 inboard engines, each spinning a four, five or six blade super-cavitating propeller at over 6,000rpm. This boat will be made available shortly after the release of the game as free DLC.

Locate and save stranded vessels, remove debris from active race courses, help crashed racers, or chase criminals while playing as the Coast Guard.

Fast paced unforgiving circuit, sprint, and drag racing. Overtake opponents using strategic turning, throttling and trim. Turn nearly 180° instantaneously, accelerate from 0-60 in under two seconds, no brakes or traction to a road, slam through buoys, and hydroplane on the razors edge.

Race as or against real power boat drivers! Men and women from all over the world. Using the latest 3D software we're able to import real drivers right into the cockpit.

Built with Unreal Engine®. Boats, buoys, and debris all interact with the water surface based on realistic buoyancy and physics. Players can race in the ocean, on vast lakes, or even shallow meandering rivers. Rooster tails, wakes, thunderstorms, water spraying on the windshield... It's going to get wet!

Modify the weather, wind, and time of day. Race on a dark and stormy night or at the break of dawn with the moon still in the sky. Adjust the strength of the wind to make it easier or more difficult to drive.

Dragster, Jetsprint, Inboard Hydroplane, Offshore (Outboard), Laydown, Runabout, Electric Hydrofoil, Hovercraft, Pleasure Boats, Yachts, Military Vessels, Personal Watercraft

Full Controller Support, Steam Controller Support, Character Creation/Selection, Custom Paintjobs, Local/LAN Multiplayer, Level Editor, Steam Leaderboards, Steam Achievements, VR Support, Support for Race Wheels.

Join Discord® or add your email to our mailing list on the website and be the first to learn about release dates, news, contests, future DLC, and more.

legal_notice:
Tunnel Boat Terror is currently under development. Participation, endorsement, features, release dates, system requirements, and details are all subject to change.

All company, service and product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners and are used for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement. All images and videos on this site have been taken from "in-game play", unless otherwise specified. This site and advertisement are meant for demonstration purposes only and do not reflect the final quality or features of the game.

© 2023 Falcon Racing Studios | | All Rights Reserved
name: Tunnel Boat Terror Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Drive terrifyingly fast and iconic power boats each with unique; design, destruction, customizations, tuning, turning, throttling, and trim. Improve your skill and equipment in your pursuit of becoming a power boat racing legend. A brand-new racing experience for enthusiasts and newcomers alike.
